name.es: LunaNotes - Toma notas dentro de YouTube

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Simplest Way to Take Notes on YouTube Videos!
short.es: ¬°La forma m√°s sencilla de tomar notas en los videos de YouTube!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
üåü LunaNotes: Supercharge Your YouTube Learning with Cutting-Edge AI!

Ever feel overwhelmed by the amazing things you learn on YouTube? Wish there was a way to harness that knowledge and never forget those "aha!" moments? LunaNotes is your personal AI-powered learning companion, designed to elevate your YouTube experience to a whole new level.

üöÄ Take Smarter Notes with AI Assistance:

- AI-powered completions: Let our AI suggest text as you type, helping you capture key points faster and more efficiently.
- Video summarization and keyword extraction: Focus on the most important aspects of videos with automatic summaries and keyword identification. No more scrambling to remember everything!
- Chat-with-Video: Experience a ChatGPT-like interaction for YouTube that helps you craft better notes by chatting directly with your videos. Ask questions, get explanations, and enhance your understanding in real-time.

üìù Beyond Basic Notes:

- Enhanced Note Editor: Our clean and user-friendly editor lets you write, style, and organize your notes effortlessly. Plus, auto-saving ensures you never lose a thought.
- Powerful Screenshot & Annotation: Capture crucial video moments and add annotations for ultimate clarity. LunaNotes becomes your personalized learning hub.
- Timestamps & Tags: Mark specific video moments and categorize your notes with ease. The new Tags page helps you find everything instantly, making knowledge retrieval a breeze.
- Accessible on Any Device: Take your notes anywhere with LunaNotes' versatile web app. Learn on your desktop, then review key points on your phone ‚Äì the flexibility is yours.

ü§ù Unleash the Power of Collaboration:

- Zapier Integration: Connect LunaNotes to your favorite apps using Zapier. Automate workflows and streamline your learning process.
- Public Note Sharing: Share your insights with the world! LunaNotes allows you to share notes publicly, fostering knowledge exchange and collaboration.

üåç A Thriving Community Awaits:

- Over 10,000 users: LunaNotes is a rapidly growing community of passionate learners. Share insights, exchange tips, and elevate your knowledge together.
- Continuous Innovation: We're dedicated to constant improvement, with regular updates that ensure LunaNotes stays ahead of the curve and perfectly aligns with your evolving needs.

Dive into a world of smarter YouTube learning! Download LunaNotes today and unlock the power of AI-assisted knowledge capture and collaboration. üìöüí¨

For a detailed list of app updates and changes, please refer to our blog.

CHANGELOG:
aug/10/2024: Show notes on youtube player
aug/06/2024: Fix internal errors and make the app more performant
jul/19/2024: Sync session between web app and extension
mar/31/2024: Fix yellow button error on inline design
sep/20/2023: Improved video page design, added dedicated Notes and Tags pages, enhanced note editor with auto-save, introduced AI completions, and more!
aug/20/2023: Fixing new design height
aug/15/2023: New Image editor
may/04/2023: New signup wizard
jan/06/2023: Fixing the taking screenshot feature
aug/27/2022: Bug fixing, preventing creating duplicated tags
aug/25/2022: Dark mode support!
aug/16/2022: Fixed tags removing after editing note title and tags being duplicated
aug/11/2022: You can now add tags to the notes
jul/28/2022: Bugfixes, you can now write code with the new code block option
jul/20/2022: You can now reset your password
jul/10/2022: Added the feature to edit the title of the video.
jul/05/2022: New UI, Wiew the list of videos in which you have added notes within any video.
jan/15/2022: Fixed UI errors.
jan/09/2022: Improved UI, improved note editor style and made tons of internal improvements.
nov/29/2021: fixed some translations.
nov/28/2021: Improved UI, added a fluid container for the app inside YouTube.
nov/27/2021: A web application was created to manage notes outside youtube. 
oct/31/2021: Fixed errors that occurred when saving the note title
oct/30/2021: New note animation and fixed a bug that caused previous notes not to be updated when creating a new note


DISCLAIMER
This extension is NOT made by Google or YouTube, it is created by Fernando de la Rosa, @jfdelarosa on X.

LunaNotes is not owned, licensed and is not an affiliate of YouTube or Google Inc.
